Taken In Broad Daylight
Source: DVD
Genre: Crime/Drama/Thriller
Runtime: 89 mins
Audio Language: English
Subtitles: N/A
IMDB Rating: 5.5/10 (51 votes)

Director: Gary Yates
Writers: Charlene Blaine & Kim Delgado
Cast:
Sara Canning, James Van Der Beek, LeVar Burton, Diana Reis, Tom Anniko, Brian Edward Roach, Sarah Constible, Jacqueline Loewen, Garth Merkeley, Adriana O'Neil, Nancy Drake, Karl Thordarson, Robert Huculak, Aaron Hughes, Kristen Harris.

The true and inspiring survival story of a teen horrifically kidnapped, how she manipulates her deranged captor, leaves clues, stays witty in her own mind to control her fear, engineers then ultimately negotiates her safe rescue after enduring six and a half days of hell.
